nodes.text: Sweetblossom was a flower whose extract produced a significant narcotic effect. While not addicting, the extract was used nonethteless by abusers who preferred to evade life's demands. While completely aware of their environment, users of sweetblossom had an attitude of procrastination and apathy. Rebel Alliance pilot Greglik spoke highly of the drug.
On Nam Chorios, Leia Organa Solo was drugged with sweetblossom by Seti Ashgad and Dzym the droch in an attempt to prevent her from fleeing their palace.
